loot_items.name: Potion of Resistance
loot_items.description: When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to one type of damage for 1 hour. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder.

loot_items.name: Potion of Radiant Resistance
loot_items.description: When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to radiant damage for 1 hour.

loot_items.name: Spell Scroll (3rd)
loot_items.description: A spell scroll containing a 3rd level spell. If the spell is on your class's spell list, you can cast it without material components. Otherwise, the scroll is unintelligible. The spell's saving throw DC is 15 and the attack bonus is +7.

loot_items.name: Potion of Force Resistance
loot_items.description: When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to force damage for 1 hour.

trinkets.name: Silvered Acorn
trinkets.description: A perfectly preserved acorn coated in a thin layer of silver. When held, it feels faintly warm and emits a soft, calming chime when shaken.

trinkets.name: Glimmering Beetle Shell
trinkets.description: A small, iridescent beetle shell that shimmers with shifting colors. It is said to bring luck to those who carry it into unknown places.

trinkets.name: Tiny Wooden Mask
trinkets.description: A miniature mask carved from dark wood, depicting a laughing face. Whispering into it causes the mask to echo the sound back in a distorted, giggling tone.
